tasks.task: Determine historical prices of agricultural equipment.
subtasks: Research the original cost of Case VAC tractors in 1955.

subtasks: Identify the target market (American farmers) for Case VAC.

subtasks: Catalog the 13-year production run of Case VAC from 1942 to 1955.
Note the shift from gasoline to distillate engines during this period.
